home.various-types-of-metal-structures-first: Various types of metal structures, decor
home.about-us-first-p: We are ready to offer you the full range of services for the manufacture and transportation of metal structures. Despite the fact that many enterprises try to increase production rates by any means, we carefully monitor the quality of products, because safety and reliability depend on this.
home.about-us-second-p: Also, we, SP Metallinvest, closely cooperate with leading manufacturers of rolled metal and their dealers throughout Ukraine and regions, which allows us to purchase the materials necessary for the fulfillment of orders as quickly as possible. Our own delivery service delivers metal structures, rolled metal, materials, components and products to the facility where the installation is carried out.
home.why-should-you-work-with-us: Why should you work with us?
home.individual-approach-p: We offer the development of your unique product. We analyze and design.
home.own-production-areas-p: We use our equipment to make your product.
home.high-precision-equipment-p: We work with equipment of various complexity. Including with high-precision.
home.finished-products-p: We offer the manufacture of products based on ready-made cutouts.
home.fast-deadlines-p: We fulfill orders on time, within the stipulated time, or earlier.
home.delivery-p: We have our own transport, which we use to deliver your products within Kyiv.
home.metal-cover-second-p: for the exit part of the pavilion
home.laser-cutting-of-metal-second-p: complexity by the method of laser cutting
home.do-you-want-to-order-a-product: Do you want to order a product or discuss an order?
